refnamediv.refpurpose: Configurable slider controls for realtime user input.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Configurable slider controls for realtime user input. Requires Winsound or TCL/TK. control reads a slider's value.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Note that this opcode is not available on Windows due to the implimentation of pipes on that system
knum -- number of the slider to be read.

Calling control will create a new slider on the screen. There is no theoretical limit to the number of sliders. Windows and TCL/TK use only integers for slider values, so the values may need rescaling. GUIs usually pass values at a fairly slow rate, so it may be advisable to pass the output of control through port.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: See the setctrl opcode for an example.
